## ksctl cred

Login to your Cloud-provider Credentials

### Synopsis

login to your cloud provider credentials

```
ksctl cred [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help             help for cred
  -s, --storage string   storage provider
  -v, --verbose          for verbose output (default true)
```
